definitions.body: :Job 18:12 distress, calamity (under wh. one bends, cf. Ar. 0’a0y’idun burdening)—´[[א]] Job 21:30 +; cstr. id. Job 31:23 +; [[אֵידי]] 2Sa 22:19 = Ps 18:19 etc.;—distress, calamity (poet. chiefly WisdLt & late); Pr 17:5, Pr 27:10.
national calam. of Isr. (apostate) Je 18:17, Ez Eze 35:5, Ob:Ob 13, Ob:Ob 13, Ob:Ob 13; of Egypt Je 46:21; Moab Je 48:16; Edom ([[עֵשָׂו]] ´[[א]]) Je 49:8; Hazor v:Je 49:32.
of righteous sufferer 2Sa 22:19 = Ps 18:19 cf. [[אֵל]] ´[[א]] i.e. from God Job 31:23 & [[אָרְחוֹת אֵידָם]] Job 30:12 their calamitous paths (sf. ref. to bereavement, pain, etc.)

oft. of wicked Job 18:12, Job 21:17, Job 31:3, Pr 1:26, Pr 1:27 (wisd. mocks at; ‖[[פַּחַד]]) Pr 6:15, Pr 24:22; also ´[[יוֹם א]] De 32:35, Job 21:30 (cf. supr. 2Sa 22:19 = Ps 18:19, Pr 27:10, Je 18:17, Je 46:21, Ob:Ob 13, Ob:Ob 13, Ob:Ob 13 where ‖[[יוֹם אׂבֶד יוֹם חָרה]] v:Ob 12, v:Ob 14, cf. [[יוֹם יהוה]] v:Ob 15).
